root.name: Family Pirate Party
root.description: OverviewFamily Pirate Party is a WiiWare party game that was released on May 11, 2009. It was developed by Arc System Works and published by Aksys Games and is part of the Family series of leisurely sports and party games. In this game, the series characters Billy, Sarah, Mommy and Daddy take the roles of pirates in a pirate-themed board game.
